entry.em: ..EXCESSIVE HEAT WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM CDT THURSDAY
entry.data: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 571 IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM CDT THIS EVENING

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS LIKELY THIS EVENING, THEN MOSTLY CLEAR WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS AFTER MIDNIGHT
SOME THUNDERSTORMS MAY BE SEVERE WITH DAMAGING WINDS
LOCALLY HEAVY RAINFALL POSSIBLE THIS EVENING
LOWS IN THE UPPER 70S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

SUNNY, HOT WITH HIGHS IN THE UPPER 90S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
HIGHEST HEAT INDEX READINGS HEAT INDEX READINGS UP TO 109 IN THE AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLEAR
HUMID WITH LOWS IN THE UPPER 70S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

SUNNY, HOT WITH HIGHS IN THE UPPER 90S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
HIGHEST HEAT INDEX READINGS HEAT INDEX READINGS UP TO 108 IN THE AFTERNOON

PARTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING, THEN MOSTLY CLEAR AFTER MIDNIGHT
HUMID WITH LOWS IN THE MID 70S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 90S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 70S
HIGHS AROUND 90

CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 90S

data.HIGHS: SUNNY, HOT WITH HIGHS IN THE MID 90S
